campaignevents-error-invalid-dashboard-u: URL ya Dashboard oyo epesami ezali na format ya malamu te. URL esengeli kozala na format oyo: $1/[Nkombo ya Ebongiseli]/[Titre ya Programme]. Ndakisa: $1/Ebongiseli_ya_Ndakisa/Titre_ya_Eloko_ya_Ndakisa.

campaignevents-error-invalid-address: Tyá adresi oyo ezali na ntina.
campaignevents-error-move-eventpage-name: Bokomisi nkombo ya makambo epesami nzela te na esika oyo ya nkombo.

campaignevents-edit-field-wikis-help: Soki likambo na yo ezali kosalema na ba wiki ya sikisiki, tosengi otanga yango awa. Yango esalisaka bato bázwa ekateli ya koyeba milulu nini basengeli kokende, mpe esalisaka mpe na makambo ya kosala analize.
campaignevents-edit-field-tracking-tools: Lien ya Dashboard ya ba programmes & événements

Ba kombo ya basaleli ya ba participants oyo bakomisami na miso ya bato ekotindama automatiquement na Dashboard. Esaleli oyo esalisaka yo olandela ba contributions ya ba participants mpe komeka impact ya événement ya campagne na yo. [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:Monoko na Ngai/Mabongisi_%26_Dashboard_ya Makambo Yekola makambo mingi].
Tyá URL ya Dashboard ya Programmes & Events mpo na événement na yo

campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: Soki ozali na groupe ya chat en ligne pona ba participants ya événement oyo, okoki kobakisa lien ya invitation awa. Ba participants bakozala na makoki ya kotala lien ya invitation sima ya ko inscrire.
campaignevents-edit-field-event-is-test: Oyo ezali événement en direct to ya test?
campaignevents-edit-field-topics-help: Okoki kobakisa maximum ya {{PLURAL:$1|sujet moko|$1 sujets}}.

campaignevents-edit-form-questions-pii-n: Mpo na kotala biyano ya kosangisa ya ba participants oyo ezali na ba informations personnelles, bakosenga yo osimba ba informations ya participant, y compris ba informations personnelles identifiantes ya participant, oyo esangisi na tango ya inscription ya événement na bokebi.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice:
Kaka ba kombo ya basaleli nde ekozwama epai ya baye bakosangana na tango ya bokomisi nkombo. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:Monoko na Ngai/Lisalisi:Bobakisi
:CampaignEvents/Inscription Yekola makambo mingi].

campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: Evenement moko te na ID oyo.
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: Svp '''[$1 bongisa bokomisi na yo ya likambo na $2]''', wiki esika likambo yango esalemaki.

campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-con: Ekoki te ko connecter na $1 mpo na problème ya configuration ya site.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Moko te kati na babongisi ya molulu oyo azali ba facilitateurs ya cours $1 .
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-alr: Cours $1 ezali déjà na ba participants, et donc ekoki kozala connecté na événement oyo te.
Cours $1 esi ekangami na événement moko, pe ekoki ko connecter lisusu te.
campaignevents-tracking-tool-wikiedu-not: Cours $1 ezali connecté na événement oyo te, mpe na yango ekoki kozala synchronisé te.
campaignevents-registration-confirmation: Bokomisi nkombo ya moto ye moko: Nkombo na yo ya mosaleli na liste ya basangani ekoki komonana kaka na babongisi ya molulu mpe bato ya mosaleli oyo elandi {{PLURAL:$2| etuluku|bituluku}}: $1 . Mabonza na yo na tango ya molulu ekoki kolongolama na babongisi na [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] to bisaleli mosusu mpo na kosangisa mituya.

Inscription privée: Nkombo na yo ya mosaleli na liste ya ba participants ekoki komonana kaka na ba organisateurs ya événement. Mabonza na yo na tango ya molulu ekoki kolongolama na babongisi na [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] to bisaleli mosusu mpo na kosangisa mituya.

Kokomisa nkombo na bato nyonso: Lakisa nkombo na yo ya mosaleli na liste ya bato oyo bakosangana na bato nyonso. Mabonza na yo na tango ya molulu ekoki kozala na babongisi na [https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Programs_%26_Events_Dashboard Programs & Events Dashboard] to bisaleli mosusu mpo na kosangisa mituya.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-private-: {{GENDER:$1| Mosangani akomisamaki nkombo}} na ndenge ya privé
echo-pref-tooltip-campaign-events-notifi: Yebisa ngai ntango nakomikomisa nkombo mpo na molulu oyo esalelaka esaleli ya Bokomisi nkombo ya makambo.
campaignevents-notification-registration: Matondo mingi mpo na kokomisa nkombo mpo na $1 .
Bo sangana na $1 pona ko connecter na ba participants misusu pe kozua ba mises à jour ya kobakisa epayi ya ba organisateurs.
Kota na [[Special:AllEvents|Liste ya boyokani]] mpo na koluka makambo mpe masanga mingi na ba wiki.

campaignevents-email-footer: Email oyo ezalaki {{GENDER:$1| atindaki}} na $1 na {{GENDER:$2| $2 }}, mosangani oyo akomisamaki nkombo ya likambo oyo elandi: $3 . Soki {{GENDER:$2| yo}} oyanoli na email oyo, {{GENDER:$2| email na yo}} ekotindama mbala moko na {{GENDER:$1| motindi ya ebandeli}}, kobimisa {{GENDER:$2| adresse email na yo}} na {{GENDER:$1| bango}}.

Naino napesa maboko na projet moko ya Wikimedia te
Nazali na mwa eksperiansi, kasi nazali koyoka elikia te
Nazali na mwa mayele, mpe nayokaka elikia ya kopesa maboko, kasi nakolinga koyekola mingi

campaignevents-register-retention-base: Biyano na yo esangisi mpe na nsima elongolami mikolo 90 nsima ya kotinda to na nsuka ya molulu, oyo ekoya liboso. Bobongisi biyano ntango nyonso liboso ya ntango wana. Soki elongolami, bakoki kobongola yango te, koyanola lisusu te, to kozwa yango te.
campaignevents-register-retention-days: Ntango oyo etikali kino biyano na yo ekosangana mpe ekolongolama ezali: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| mokolo|mikolo}} .

campaignevents-eventpage-register-dialog: Ba informations oyo ekokabolama kaka na ba organisateurs ya événement.
Ba réponses na yo esangisi pe e supprimer par ba informations ya retention ya ba données.
Ba sango ya bobateli ba données

Biyano na yo esangisi mpe na nsima elongolami mikolo 90 nsima ya kotinda to na nsuka ya molulu, oyo ekoya liboso. Bobongisi biyano ntango nyonso liboso ya ntango wana. Soki elongolami, bakoki kobongola yango te, koyanola lisusu te, to kozwa yango te.
Ntango oyo etikali kino biyano na yo ekosangana mpe ekolongolama ezali: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| mokolo|mikolo}} .
Ntango oyo etikali kino biyano na yo ekosangisa mpe ekolongolama ezali: na nse ya ngonga 24 .
campaignevents-details-stats-no-response: Evenement oyo ezali na ba réponses te ya ba participants na aggregate.
campaignevents-details-stats-not-ready: Biyano ya baye bakosangana ekosangisama mpe ekopesama awa kala mingi te.
campaignevents-details-stats-section-non: Mituna ya sango oyo ekoki koyebana moto te (oyo ezali ya PII te).
campaignevents-details-stats-section-pii: Mituna ya Basango oyo ekoki koyebana na moto (PII).
campaignevents-details-stats-not-enough-: Motuna oyo ezwi na nse ya $1 mobimba {{PLURAL:$1| eyano|biyano}}.
campaignevents-event-dates-cannot-be-cha: Evenement esili, yango wana okoki te ko changer ba dates ya événement na ba dates oyo ekoya. Epekiseli oyo ebatelaka ba données ya ba participants.
campaignevents-individual-stats-label-me: Ozali koyoka elikia boni mpo na kopesa maboko na misala ya Wikimedia oyo etali molulu oyo?
Ozali na kati ya ba affiliés ya Wikimedia (mikapo, bituluku ya basaleli, mangomba ya thématique)?
campaignevents-edit-field-clickwrap-chec: Lokasa oyo ezali na biyano ya kosangisa ya baye basanganaki na mituna ya formulaire ya bokomisi nkombo.
Mpo na kotala biyano oyo esangisi ba participants oyo ezali na ba informations personnelles, esengeli ondima oyo elandi:
Nandimi kosimba ba sango ya mosangani, bakisa mpe Basango oyo ekoki koyeba moto ya mosangani, oyo ezwami na ntango ya bokomisi nkombo na molulu na bokebi.
campaignevents-participant-question-have: Oyo {{GENDER:$1| biyano ya mosangani}} esangisi mpe elongolami
campaignevents-warning-change-event-end-: Soki obongoli mokolo ya suka na mokolo eleki, molulu ekokangama mpe okozwa bokuse ya biyano ya basangani. Action oyo ekoki kozongisama sima te. Yango ekoki kosalelama kaka soki baye basanganaki bapesaki biyano na mituna ya mosangani.
campaignevents-event-details-participant: Biyano ya ba participants moko moko elongolami mpe biyano oyo esangisi ezali na se ya [ $1 {{int:campaignevents-event-details-tab-stats}}].
campaignevents-register-page-nonlocal: Svp '''[ $1 silisa bokomisi na yo ya likambo na $2 ]''', wiki esika likambo yango esalemaki.
campaignevents-delete-registration-page-: Svp '''[ $1 bolongola bokomisi na yo ya likambo na $2 ]''', wiki esika likambo yango esalemaki.
campaignevents-event-details-page-nonloc: Ozali sikoyo kotala version limitée ya page oyo. Svp [ $1 kota na lokasa oyo na $2 ] , wiki esika likambo yango esalemaki, mpo na kozwa makambo nyonso ya likambo mpe makambo mosusu ya kobakisa.
campaignevents-event-details-sensitive-d: Compte na yo ekangami. Ozali na accès na likambo oyo te.
campaignevents-generateinvitationlist-na: Liste ya ba invitations ya Edit-a-thon
campaignevents-generateinvitationlist-ar: Tyá bankombo ya kino $1 {{PLURAL:$1| article|articles}} oyo etali ba sujets ya événement na yo. Lisolo mokomoko esengeli kozala na molɔngɔ ya sika. Na nsima, liste ya bato oyo bakopesa mabɔkɔ ekosalema na kotalela masolo oyo obakisi.
campaignevents-invitation-list-disabled: Wiki oyo ezali na ba liste ya invitation te oyo efungolami.
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-allow: Ozali na ndingisa te ya kosalela baliste ya ba invitations.
myinvitationlists: Ba liste ya ba invitations na yo
campaignevents-myinvitationslist-empty-t: Découvrez ba participants ya sika pona projet to événement na yo. Pesá liste ya masolo oyo elobeli mitó ya makambo ya mosala na yo. Na sima, okozwa liste ya invitation ya ba éditeurs oyo bakoki kozala na posa ya kosangana na projet to événement na yo.
campaignevents-myinvitationslist-generat: Salá liste ya sika ya ba invitations
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-emp: Pesá nkombo mpo na liste ya libyangi.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-inv: Tyá lokasa ya likambo oyo esalelaka Enregistrement ya makambo.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-eve: Evenement oyo esili. Tyá likambo moko oyo ezali kosala.
campaignevents-invitation-list-error-not: Tyá lokasa ya likambo oyo ekotánga yo lokola mobongisi.
campaignevents-worklist-error-empty: Tyá ata motó ya likambo moko ya lisolo moko.
campaignevents-worklist-error-too-large: Okotisi $1 {{PLURAL:$1| article|masolo}}. Svp kotisa kati ya 1 na $2 {{PLURAL:$2| masolo}}.
campaignevents-worklist-error-invalid-ti:
Óyo elandi {{PLURAL:$1| likáni ezalí na litɛ́mɛ lya mabé| makáni ezalí na matɛ́mɛ ma mabé}}. Palado, bobɔngisa {{PLURAL:$1| yangó|matɛ́mɛ}} mpé meka lisúsu.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-nonexisten:
Oyo elandi {{PLURAL:$1| article ezalaki|masolo ezalaki}} ezwami te. Svp bo vérifier {{PLURAL:$1| titre|titles}} pe meka lisusu.
 $2
campaignevents-worklist-error-titles-not:
Oyo elandi {{PLURAL:$1| article ezali|masolo ezali}} na esika ya kombo ya monene te. Svp kotisa ba articles na espace principal ya kombo kaka.
 $2
campaignevents-invitation-list-processin: Liste na yo ya ba éditeurs oyo osengeli kobengisa ezali kosalama. Bozongisa lokasa na sima na miniti 5-10 mpo na kotala liste ya ba invitations na yo.
campaignevents-invitation-list-invalid-i: Pesa ID ya liste ya invitation oyo ezali na ntina. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Tala ba liste ya ba invitations na yo]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-does-not-: Liste oyo ya ba invitations ezali te. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Tala ba liste ya ba invitations na yo]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-not-creat: Ozali na ndingisa te ya kotala liste oyo ya libyangi mpo ete osala yango te. [[Special:MyInvitationLists|Tala ba liste ya ba invitations na yo]].
campaignevents-invitation-list-nonlocal: Svp '''[ $1 tala liste oyo ya libyangi na $2 ]''', wiki esika esalamaki.
campaignevents-invitation-list-intro: $1 {{PLURAL:$1| editor|editors}} bazwaki, na kotalela ba critères oyo : ba octets oyo bapesaki na masolo, motango ya bobongisi oyo basalaki na masolo, motango ya bobongisi na bango mobimba na ba wiki, mpe ndenge nini kala mingi te babongoli ba wiki.
campaignevents-invitationlist-no-editors: Mobongisi moko te akokisaka [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists critères ya liste ya libyangi] uta na liste ya masolo na yo. Okoki [[Special:GenerateInvitationList|kosala liste ya sika ya libyangi]] na liste ya masolo ya sika.
campaignevents-invitationlist-highly-rec: Ba éditeurs oyo bazuaki classement ya likolo ya liste ya ba invitations, yango wana bazali plus susceptibles ya kosangana na activité na yo.
campaignevents-invitationlist-recommende: Ba éditeurs oyo bazuaki classement ya liste ya invitation ya milieu, kasi bakoki kaka kozala na posa ya kosangana na activité na yo.
campaignevents-event-details-footer: Kota na [[Special:AllEvents|Liste ya boyokani]] mpo na koluka makambo mpe masanga mingi.
campaignevents-invitationlist-preference: Bo kotisa ngai na [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Lisalisi:Extension:CampaignEvents/Invitation_lists ba liste ya ba invitations].
campaignevents-allevents-label-include-a: Botia makambo oyo efungwami na ba wiki nionso
campaignevents-eventslist-all-wikis: Molulu oyo ezali polele mpo na ba wiki nyonso.
campaignevents-eventpage-all-wikis: Molulu oyo ezali polele mpo na ba wiki nyonso.
campaignevents-allevents-label-upcoming-: Makambo oyo ekosalema: Makambo oyo ebandi na mikolo oyo oponi
campaignevents-allevents-label-ongoing-e: Makambo oyo ezali kokoba: Makambo oyo ebandi liboso kasi ekokoba na kati ya mikolo oyo baponi
campaignevents-allevents-transclusion-mo: Luká koyeba makambo mosusu mpe bituluku mosusu
communityconfiguration-campaignevents-de: Ba options ya configuration pona extension ya CampaignEvents
communityconfiguration-campaignevents-ca: Ba espaces ya kombo ya événement ya valide
